data.title: Car Service, Charter Bus, Airport Shuttle, Taxi
data.meta_description: Mears offers limo car service, airport and cruise port transportation in various U.S. cities; charter bus, airport shuttle, and taxi services in Orlando, FL.
data.text:
Our Orlando Transportation Services

Orlando Car Service and Limousine Services with professional chauffeurs are offered through our Mears Luxe private car service group.

Mears Orlando Car Service, Charter Bus, and Taxi Services are available to and from Orlando (MCO) & Orlando Sanford (SFB) International Airports, private jet airports, hotels, resorts, restaurants, sporting events, shopping plazas, theme parks, including Walt Disney WorldÂ® Resort, Universal StudiosÂ® Florida, SeaWorldÂ® Orlando and other Central Florida attractions.
